task.title: How to Make Chocolate Ice Cream
task.shortdesc: If you want to make chocolate ice cream, then you've come to the right place. This task will tell you how to make chocolate ice cream using the ICE-60W machine.

taskbody.context:
Ingredients include:
2/3 cup of cocoa powder
Â½ cup of granulated sugar
1/3 cup of packed brown sugar
1 pinch of kosher salt
1.5 cups of whole milk
3.5 cups of heavy cream
2 teaspoons of pure vanilla extract
Steps:

step.cmd: Combine all of the ingredients in a cup or bowl
Pour the combined ingredients into the cap with measurement cup
Select "ice cream" on the control panel
Let the ice cream churn and thicken for 20-25 minutes
Place ice cream into a tub place into freezer for 10-15 minutes
Take ice cream out of freezer, scoop the desired amount into a bowl
Add any toppings you want and enjoy!
step.stepresult: If you followed the instructions above, then you have successfully made chocolate ice cream.
